new_messages.content:
I have successfully sold all existing positions: 恒瑞医药 (600276.SH), 中信证券 (600030.SH), 中芯国际 (688981.SH), 工商银行 (601398.SH), 国泰海通 (601211.SH), 农业银行 (601288.SH), 交通银行 (601328.SH), 伊利股份 (600887.SH), 中国船舶 (600150.SH), 京沪高铁 (601816.SH), and 中国建筑 (601668.SH).

Now, I have purchased 100 shares of the following stable, large-cap stocks to rebalance the portfolio: 中国平安 (601318.SH), 招商银行 (600036.SH), 紫金矿业 (601899.SH), 长江电力 (600900.SH), 兴业银行 (601166.SH), 中国神华 (601088.SH), 万华化学 (600309.SH), 中国太保 (601601.SH), 中国移动 (600941.SH), 中国石油 (601857.SH), 中国石化 (600028.SH), 中国银行 (601988.SH), and 中国核电 (601985.SH).

The new portfolio is diversified across various stable sectors and is positioned for long-term growth.
<FINISH_SIGNAL>
